definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
Mustelidae (taxonomic family of weasel, otter, mink)

sentences.english: Sasuke sort of looks like itachi in this picture.
sentences.chinese: 佐助有点像在看这张照片鼬。

sentences.english: A weasel has soft under-fur protected by stiff, shiny guard hairs.
sentences.chinese: 鼬的柔软的下层绒毛，由坚硬明亮的针毛保护着。

sentences.english: "I love you as high as I can climb, " Itachi said mildly.
sentences.chinese: “我爱你到现在这么高”鼬温和地说。

sentences.english: These include the giant kangaroo rat, the Indiana myosis bat, the black-footedferret and the hog deer.
sentences.chinese: 包括长鼻袋鼠，印第安缩瞳蝙蝠，黑足鼬以及豚鹿。

sentences.english: Itachi looks old in this picture.
sentences.chinese: 鼬在这张照片看起来旧。

sentences.english: But there are also genetic grounds for the mongoose’s courage.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，猫鼬的勇气，还有遗传学的根据。

sentences.english: Describe the color of Sasuke vs Itachi battle.
sentences.chinese: 描述一下，佐助vs鼬这场战斗的色彩。

sentences.english: However, rabies is uncommon in dogs, cats, and ferrets in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 无论如何，在美国，狗，猫和鼬的狂犬病都是罕见的。

sentences.english: At Kamarpukur I have seen the mongoose living in its hole up in the wall.
sentences.chinese: 我在卡玛普库儿看过猫鼬住在隐蔽在墙上的洞穴里。

sentences.english: The meerkat is in fact a mongoose.
sentences.chinese: 猫鼬实际上是獴科动物。

sentences.english: Meerkats are native to a desert region in southern Africa.
sentences.chinese: 海盗猫鼬源于南非的沙漠地区。

sentences.english: Reduced the effect of Elixir of Mongoose and Elixir of Major Agility.
sentences.chinese: 降低猫鼬药剂与极效敏捷药剂的效果。

sentences.english: Watchful meerkats scout for predators outside their burrow in the South African Kalahari.
sentences.chinese: 这种名为海岛猫鼬的动物生活在南非喀拉哈里沙漠。

sentences.english: How does the mongoose defeat the king cobra?
sentences.chinese: 那么，这些猫鼬是如何击败眼镜王蛇的呢？

sentences.english: At last the mongoose took on one of the world's most poisonous snakes.
sentences.chinese: 最终，猫鼬制服了世界上这只最毒毒蛇之一的眼镜蛇。

definition: Orochimaru, Japanese folktale hero/Orochimaru, character in the Naruto manga series
straight or circular throwing-knife used by ninja and samurai (loanword from Japanese 手裏剣 shuriken)
puppet burial object/wooden effigy buried to put a curse on sb
Yamata no Orochi, serpent with eight heads and eight tails from mythological section of Nihon Shoki (Chronicles of Japan)
(slang) (Tw) person from Taipei 臺北|台北[Tai2 bei3]
